directions.dakelh: Mix dry ingredients together. Create a well in the dry mix and pour water into well. Mix together.
directions.english: Mix dry ingredients together. Create a well in the dry mix and pour water into well. Mix together.

directions.dakelh: Sprinkle some flour on a clean surface to knead the dough.  Knead the dough until it is evenly textured.
directions.english: Sprinkle some flour on a clean surface to knead the dough.  Knead the dough until it is evenly textured.

directions.dakelh: Using a spoon, take some dough, smaller than the size of the buns you want because it will rise, and roll into a ball.
directions.english: Using a spoon, take some dough, smaller than the size of the buns you want because it will rise, and roll into a ball.

directions.dakelh: In a large frying pan, heat the 2 cups of oil until it is hot. Once it is hot, place the balls into the pan. Flip the buns when they start browning.
directions.english: In a large frying pan, heat the 2 cups of oil until it is hot. Once it is hot, place the balls into the pan. Flip the buns when they start browning.

directions.dakelh: When both sides are brown, buns are done.
directions.english: When both sides are brown, buns are done.
